Acqua Di Gio was my very first cologne I’ve ever owned in high school and was my signature scent for quite a while until I got a couple more  fragrances to add to my collection and would alternate between them. I’ve only ever bought that one bottle of Acqua but to me it’s still a nostalgic scent.

comments_since_last_sample.body: I'd like to enter the giveaway. Another fresh scent in my mini collection is always welcomed

Acqua Di Gio was my very first cologne I’ve ever owned in high school and was my signature scent for quite a while until I got a couple more  fragrances to add to my collection and would alternate between them. I’ve only ever bought that one bottle of Acqua but to me it’s still a nostalgic scent.
I do not have the original but i do have Profumo, Profondo and ezzensa so i Only miss This one!
